trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that arranges <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGalleryCategory" /> objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" /> class.
The size that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" /> needs to position its child elements.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />이 자식을 배치하는 데 필요로 하는 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: Positions and sizes the child elements in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />에 있는 자식 요소의 위치와 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: The actual size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the horizontal axis is possible.
trans-unit.target: 가로 축에서 스크롤이 가능한지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.
<see langword="false" /> in all cases.
When set, the value of this property is always coerced to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 경우,이 속성의 값은 항상로 강제 변환 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the vertical axis is possible.
trans-unit.target: 세로 축에서 스크롤이 가능한지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.
<see langword="true" /> in all cases.
When set, the value of this property is always coerced to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 경우,이 속성의 값은 항상로 강제 변환 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The vertical size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
Gets the horizontal size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The horizontal size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
Gets the horizontal offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The horizontal offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
Scrolls the content down by one line.
Scrolls the content left by one line.
Scrolls the content right by one line.
Scrolls the content up by one line.
The object to make visible.
A bounding rectangle that identifies the coordinate space to be made visible.
trans-unit.target: 표시할 좌표 공간을 식별하는 경계 사각형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Forces content to scroll until the coordinate space of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> object is visible.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 개체의 좌표 공간이 보일 때까지 콘텐츠를 스크롤합니다.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle that is visible.
The maximum size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.

Measures the child elements in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" /> in preparation of arranging them during the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> pass.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel.ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size)" /> 단계 동안 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />의 자식 요소 정렬을 준비하기 위해 측정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The desired size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" />.
Scrolls the content down the number of lines indicated by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 내용을 <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines" /> 속성에 나타난 줄 수만큼 아래로 스크롤합니다.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content left the number of lines indicated by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 내용을 <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines" /> 속성에 나타난 줄 수만큼 왼쪽으로 스크롤합니다.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content right the number of lines indicated by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 내용을 <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines" /> 속성에 나타난 줄 수만큼 오른쪽으로 스크롤합니다.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content up the number of lines indicated by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 내용을 <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemParameters.WheelScrollLines" /> 속성에 나타난 줄 수만큼 위로 스크롤합니다.

trans-unit.source: Invoked when a layout pass begins.
This method invalidates the measurements of elements in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 에 있는 요소의 측정을 무효화 하는이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content down by one page.
Scrolls the content left by one page.
Scrolls the content right by one page.
Scrolls the content up by one page.
Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> element that controls scrolling behavior.
trans-unit.target: 스크롤 동작을 제어하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> 요소를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> element that controls scrolling behavior.
The amount that content is horizontally offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]의 포함하는 뷰포트에서 콘텐츠가 가로 방향으로 오프셋되는 양입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the amount that content is horizontal offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]의 포함하는 뷰포트에서 콘텐츠가 가로 방향으로 오프셋되는 양을 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The amount that content is vertically offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]의 포함하는 뷰포트에서 콘텐츠가 세로 방향으로 오프셋되는 양입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the amount that content is vertical offset in the containing viewport in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]의 포함하는 뷰포트에서 콘텐츠가 세로 방향으로 오프셋되는 양을 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" /> hosts items for.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGallery" /> that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonGalleryCategoriesPanel" /> hosts items for.
Gets the vertical offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
The vertical offset of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
Gets the vertical size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]에서 콘텐츠 표시 영역의 세로 크기를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The vertical size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
Gets the horizontal size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]에서 콘텐츠 표시 영역의 가로 크기를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal size of the content's visible range in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
